title: Zimbabwe latest to ban S.Africa meat over listeria
text:
Zimbabwe latest to ban S.Africa meat over listeria Tuesday, March 06, 2018 - 01:18 
Zimbabwe will join other countries in banning imports of processed meat products from South Africa after a deadly listeria outbreak there. As Sarah Charlton reports, the decision comes after South Africa said cold meat products were to blame for delays in tracing the cause of the world's worst listeria outbreak, which has killed 180 people in the past year.
